title: MAC and me
creator_credit: Stewart Raffill, R.J. Louis and R J Louis Productions
brief_description: Eric, a wheelchair bound boy who has just moved to California begins an unusual friendship with MAC (Mysterious Alien Creature) who has accidentally landed on earth and become separated from his family. Whilst escaping from NASA MAC takes refuge in Eric’s car and accompanies the family to their new home. Eric helps MAC rejoin his family and a strong friendship is formed. Starring Jonathan Ward, Tina Casparay, Lauren Stanley and Jade Calegory.
